channel.title: [PI] Help me
channel.description:
Hey guys, just need a two things. ^^
1. I've been working with Delta and current Switched to PI, in my Delta I had a ::help command with a coded yell which would yell to everyone "Player has landed on help island" I'm just wondering if anyone knows what the yell code would be like on PI.
2. My client's background and login box is the old RuneScape log in (the one with the flames). I've downloaded Tom's Cache Suit and it wasn't in there. Does anyone know how I can link it in with my sprites folder?
Thanks.

item.title: [PI] Help me
item.dc:creator: @RealmofOmens RealmofOmens
item.description:
@RealmofOmens wrote:

Hey guys, just need a two things. ^^

  1. I’ve been working with Delta and current Switched to PI, in my Delta I had a ::help command with a coded yell which would yell to everyone “Player has landed on help island” I’m just wondering if anyone knows what the yell code would be like on PI.

  2. My client’s background and login box is the old RuneScape log in (the one with the flames). I’ve downloaded Tom’s Cache Suit and it wasn’t in there. Does anyone know how I can link it in with my sprites folder?

Thanks.
